body.p:
Columbus. Ky
August 22nd 1865.
A. J. James Esq.
Frankfort, Ky.
Dr Sir:
This will be enclosed to you by my friend George T. Badger of this county.
I take pleasure in recommending him to you as a prompt business man and a gentleman.
Any-thing you can do for him will be equally appreciated by himself and the undersigned.
He has quite an amount of legal business to attend too in this county, although not a practitioner; and may need your services at no distant day.
